meanings.definition: A state of being indifferent or apathetic
meanings.sent1: The employee's listlessness towards his work was concerning to his boss.
meanings.sent2: She felt a sense of listlessness towards the repetitive tasks at hand.
meanings.sent3: His listlessness towards the movie was evident by his constant yawning.
meanings.sent4: The listlessness in the air was palpable, affecting everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The listlessness of the crowd indicated a lack of interest in the event.
